solution_line_template: He repeats this for {years} years, meaning he gets {years}*{trains_per_year} =<<{years}*{trains_per_year}={total_trains_before_double}>>{total_trains_before_double} trains.
When this number is doubled by his parents, it becomes {total_trains_before_double}*{double_multiplier}= <<{total_trains_before_double}*{double_multiplier}={doubled_trains}>>{doubled_trains} trains.

Since he already had {total_trains_before_double} model trains, his total becomes {total_trains_before_double}+{doubled_trains}= <<{total_trains_before_double}+{doubled_trains}={total_trains}>>{total_trains} trains.
